name: Liminal Hunter
description:
You are in the backrooms, now your goal is to find a gun lying on the ground in this place and kill the monster lurking the halls, before it finds you.

Enemy Model: alexalbinyana on sketchfab

this game was made in 3 days for mini jam 98 :D

for some reason there is a bug where sometimes after a round the gun wont be able to get picked up so if that happens either reload the game or press R multiple times.
